Bash(./venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import json
with open(''exports/model_diffs/model_diff_20251020_223959.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    data = json.load(f)

print(''Roles:'', data.get(''roles'', {}))
print(''\nPerspectives:'', data.get(''perspectives'', {}))
print(''\nModel Properties:'')
print(json.dumps(data.get(''model_properties'', {}), indent=2))
")

Bash(powershell -Command "$styles = (Select-String -Path ''core/model_diff_report_v2.py'' -Pattern ''def _get_styles'' -Context 0,50 | Select-Object -First 1).Context.PostContext.Count; $scripts = (Select-String -Path ''core/model_diff_report_v2.py'' -Pattern ''def _get_scripts'' -Context 0,50 | Select-Object -First 1).Context.PostContext.Count; Write-Output ""Styles context: $styles lines, Scripts context: $scripts lines""")
